changelog:
Changelog:

New:
– Keyframe cleanup via markers:
  You no longer need to manually select keyframes using Shift.
  Simply place markers at the keyframes you want to remove and click Cleanup Keyframes.
  ➤ Ideal for removing duplicate frames after marker-based analysis.

– FS_Console integration:
  QuickLayer Pro now integrates with the FS_Console plugin.
  The package includes FS_Console.aex, which opens a popup menu beneath the cursor using Ctrl + Space (default).
  ➤ The menu provides instant access to all QuickLayer Pro functions for faster and more intuitive workflow.

Improvements:
– Text input reset after text creation:
  The text input field now clears automatically after creating a text layer, allowing for smoother, continuous text workflows.

Fixes:
– General bug fixes:
  Various minor bugs have been addressed to improve overall stability and performance.
